website_summaries.verdict: Proving once again that Sega does what Nintendon’t, this tiny Genesis is loaded with a ton of excellent games from many genres, and is a 2-player treat.
pros: 42 must-play Sega Genesis games, including Earthworm Jim, Golden Axe, and Streets of Rage 2
cons: No rewind or other bonus features

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Mini Sega
customer_reviews.text: Don't be fooled by the knock off versions of this that have been out for a couple of years. This is the Sega 30th anniversary authentic mini console. Works awesome, obviously there are wired controllers, I fixed this with a 25ft HDMI cable that allows for the console to be near the couch. I use the same cable for other mini consoles. The game selection is really good also. A lot of fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: RKlein

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo happy!
customer_reviews.text: Growing up, I had a model 2. This is a very cool addition. I like this better than the NES and SNES minis. So awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Lucius T. Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Solid SEGA
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the AtGames systems. 10/10. Is on par with NES and SNES classics. SEGA has a winner with this little nostalgia machine.
customer_reviews.author: nope_nope

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.  Such a shame.
customer_reviews.text: Well. Bad news. The item is nicely built for the most part, and looks really great. But it's useless. The input delay or screen rendering time for the video output is so laggy that the games are just plain unplayable. So sad because it seemed like Sega finally got it right. But no. This is FAR inferior to the Nintendo Mini products and not even worth $10 as a statue. It's just awful. Save your money or get a Pi or Analogue product. Returning it today. =(
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Ignore reviews about input lag! It's your TVs dummies!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent little system with some of the best games the Sega Genesis had to offer. Some people are rating the system poorly because of input lag. That is not the console's fault, it's your fault for not changing the settings on your TV. Nearly every TV has a setting for video games. You need to find that setting and turn it on. That eliminates the input lag.
customer_reviews.author: Vertigofm

customer_reviews.title: Came opened.
customer_reviews.text: Pre-ordered Mini-Genesis arrived with the seal broken and the box repackaged. I did not order a used version! Plugged it in and it seems to work OK but there's an easy "factory reset" so it could have been played. Disappointed in you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S

customer_reviews.title: The Sega Genesis Mini is Awesome!!! Amazon’s Way to ship 1 ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: The Sega Mini is Awesome! Great games great attention to detail and what was not awesome was the way Amazon sent my system to me Amazon delivered mine in paper bag material without any cushioning inside. Resulting in my Sega mini box having some damage. Those of us getting our systems through Amazon if your box comes damaged we all need to say something because most of us are paying for prime and it’s just not right That they don’t care on how they ship their items when we as buyers/collectors care. That aside it’s awesome system lots of fun would recommend just watch how Amazon ships it to you.
customer_reviews.author: MJJSunAZ13

customer_reviews.title: Rough handling during shipping
customer_reviews.text: Rough handling during shipping. Box was opened. Product inside was ok. Nothing broke or scratched. The outside box though took a few licks. Wish I had been able to buy it in person. How you see it in the pictures, is how it came sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne sanders

customer_reviews.title: Not like you remember and not worth even $20
customer_reviews.text: This is not a good system. The versions are not good and the interface is clunky. For example street fighter 2 - in order to kick or punch you have to toggle the start button as the controller has only three buttons so say playing as ryu if you want to kick you hit the start button and then hit a buttton and if you want to punch you have to then hit the start butting to switch to punches. I played for like one round and was done. A few other games are just as terrible. Avoid at all costs .
customer_reviews.author: Fishwaffle

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: I've never seen a better example of a company truly caring for a product to the point where they have the cartiage slot opennable. The games are great and the audio is beyond good. A big improve after the AtGames genesis. Get it if you love these old Sega gems.
customer_reviews.author: Darian Willis

customer_reviews.title: unbearable input lag
customer_reviews.text: couldn't bring myself to keep playing Hard Corps because the input lag was so bad. Controller d-pad feels like garbage compared to the OG 3 button controllers.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Bilello

customer_reviews.title: Its ok. But have some problems.
customer_reviews.text: 1.- Why no include the 6 buttons controller on the north america version? There's a few games that need the 6 buttons. 2.- Why nobody's talking about the D-pad problem? I'm Getting double presses on the D-pad, at first i thought was something wrong with the controller but i tried the other one with the same result. This make difficult to play some games. 3.- box came with some damages on the corners. poor packing it. No proteccion at all. just shipped on a envelope.
customer_reviews.author: Richie Psywalker

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS SYSTEM!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. I tried the knock off version a few years ago and the button response was awful. There was some serious lag, but this one it’s dead on accurate. I forgot about so many of these games but I’ve been playing it for hours now and I’m pretty sure I like this over the other two minis
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Sega truly delivered a great retro experience.
customer_reviews.text: Being someone who grew up playing the genesis collections of the past on ps2 and Gamecube this is awesome. Actually have a real Genesis is amazing and playing with the original controllers is awesome. Build quality is great and they even made the volume slider and cartidge slot movable. Game selection is awesome and me being a huge Mega Man fan this is worth it for the Wily Wars alone. You have solid titles to chose to play and even some unreleased games to try out. There is something to play for everyone. Great job Sega you have outdone yourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Carmelo R.

customer_reviews.title: Crappy shipping
customer_reviews.text: The system is great, but for how much you pay, this should arrive in a box, not a freaking envelope!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Allen Luster

customer_reviews.title: Does not play Genesis Cartridges
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cool for the pre-loaded games. It’s very small and sleek like the original genesis, however it DOES NOT PLAY CARTRIDGES. It ONLY PLAYS PRE-LOADED GAMES. The cartridge insert is completely unusable. It’s vastly too small and has NO HARDWARE to play your cartridges. In my opinion that makes it trash, as that’s literally what I bought it for...
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Best mini console to date! Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: The people who are putting bad reviews must be 8 years old. I grew up playing Genesis and this mini console is perfect! Beautifully crafted and just plain awesome all around! The games are a blast to play and the emulation and sound are dead on! You will not regret this purchase if you grew up on Sega and Nintendo!
customer_reviews.author: Spaceman

customer_reviews.title: Good product but box damaged badly
customer_reviews.text: The sega mini is great. The issue is the packaging— it came in a flimsy brown envelope. This resulted in a badly dented box that was also torn. If you are a collector and are fussy about keeping the box pristine, then this is something to take note of.
customer_reviews.author: Roque Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Back in the days
customer_reviews.text: I felt a little nostalgic and decide to purchase this Genesis Mini. With games pre install I didnt have to worry about keeping the cartridge together and clean. in addition, I purchase a 19 inch tv from Amazon to go along with the game. Im in my 50's and playing these good old games bring back good memories. Yes the graphic is totally different from todays graphic but What I miss most is the good story line. I miss the good rpg games but now I can enjoy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa G

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson but was not impressed with graphics. It was difficult to figure out how to go back to the main menu. The selection of games out of many had only 3 that were worth playing.
customer_reviews.author: Ada Rivera

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Own for Any Gamer Born Before 1990
customer_reviews.text: I grew up a Nintendo kid, and rarely played any Genesis games. Now that I've had a chance to experience peak SEGA, I am a fan -- and the Genesis Mini is an excellent way to enjoy some of the best titles the console had to offer. The collection of games available here is very good, without a dud in the bunch, and everything looks and sounds great on an HDTV. Be sure to not confuse this with the inferior offerings from AtGames, typically branded as "Sega Genesis Classic Game Console" or "Sega Genesis Flashback". While cheaper, they have fewer and lower-quality games, problems with software emulation, and notoriously bad music and sound effects.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as I Remember It
customer_reviews.text: Sega did a fantastic job. Emulation is on point. The box is identical to my original bought in the 90s. The 3 button controllers are from the original release with red letters and the grey background on the Genesis logo. Their attention to detail for the console is the best I've seen yet - no cheap plastic or corner cutting. Just need an NA release of the Tower of Power and it'll be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: The Console Wars Are Back
customer_reviews.text: The Sega Genesis mini is absolutely awesome. You get 42 mostly excellent quality games in a very high quality product straight from Sega and not the junk from Atgames. The menu is simple and easy to use and has some awesome music from yuzo koshiro known for his work on the streets of rage games. It has great sound and emulation so the entire experience should be exactly as you remember it. Now that Nintendo and Sega have their own mini systems it feels like the early 90's console wars are back with a vengeance.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with box damaged but product was fine
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality product by Sega! The box was handled very roughly though as it had dents, tears, and the bottom was re tapped to keep it shut. It was disappointing as a collector to receive the box damaged like that but I was a glad that the console and all the accessories were still in their original packaging and were not damaged in anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas E Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Pick up the Reto-Bit Controllers and Look into Project Lunar
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up for $31 from Amazon Warehouse, and at that price this thing is AWESOME. When they first came out, I think it was 89. I highly recommend picking up the Retrobit controllers which have more buttons, otherwise fighting games are really awkward, as you have to use the start button as a sort of shift key. If you are into tinkering with the games list, look into Project Lunar and I would suggest reviewing the compatibility list. For games that don't work with the stock emulator, you can launch them using other emulators.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tbot

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad
customer_reviews.text: I haven't purchased the other Sega consoles that Sega has released in the last few years, but this one seems pretty good. The games are the games. I am sure I could argue that other games should have been offered. The console includes a snapshot method to save your game stats at any moment, just like the Nintendo classics or emulators. The Dpad on the controllers seem a bit sensitive, but I think you will get used to it. I would say $79 is a bit steep. $50 would be the sweet spot on the pricing. Now lets get the Sega Saturn Mini released :)
customer_reviews.author: Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Best mini Sega around. Real deal
customer_reviews.text: Sonic 1, 2 and spinball. Columns, street fighter, virtua fighter. My favorites. Ecco isn't bad either I'm still warming up to it but in time I'll learn to love it. But the graphics, games all of them are exactly as I remember them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie St Amand

customer_reviews.title: Very Fun System
customer_reviews.text: It Has 40 Games Including Megaman The Wily Wars And Games I Wanted To Play.You Can Actually Play Regional Games By Selecting A Different Language.The Only Two Cons I Would Say Is That Street Fighter 2 Special Champion Edition Is Also Required To Have A Genesis 6 Button Controller Since The Genesis Is Has 3 Button And Press Start If You Want The Kicks.Save States Doesnt Have Delete Feature.You Have To Use It Wisely Otherwise Itll Be Messed Up Your Progress.Overall Very Fun System Play With In Any Events.
customer_reviews.author: kenpo saber

customer_reviews.title: Had to send back
customer_reviews.text: Sent it back because you only get to play they 20 something games they decided to put on there. Either make it so you can insert the old cartridge games or make it so you can easily purchase and download games. The interface was nice and it looked well made. Just wanted to play the games we liked when we were kids.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Well done Sega.
customer_reviews.text: While it is missing a few key titles, the Genesis Mini is currently my favorite mini retro console. It is well built and is a great recreation of the Genesis of old. I try to support efforts like this to encourage releases of other retro systems in the future. Well done Sega.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred L.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR MODDING
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Once I tested this out I added about 100 more games. There's videos on youtube that will teach you how to do this. I will but a usb hun so I can add the entire Sega library. Highly recomended! I use the application "Project Lunar" on my computer to mod this Sega mini. I will continue to but what I need to maximize this product. With project lunar you can also add nintendo, super nintendo, nintendo 64 and more. RESEARCH THE PROCESS OF MODDING! Youtube " Project Lunar sega mini". I added an image of Splatter House which isn't included for proof.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Varns

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with dead audio output :-(
customer_reviews.text: Unit did not output any audio signal. Tried several HDMI cables and three different TVs/AV receivers. Nothing registered any audio signal from the sega mini. Nothing is a bigger let down than having to RMA something that was just released.
customer_reviews.author: tech geek inc

customer_reviews.title: amazing product, low quality box.
customer_reviews.text: this thing is superb, looks great, feels great , plays great, it is just amazing quality, it even comes with a power brick and same as previous classic consoles, the menu is superb with catchy music. But be warned, the box itself is flimsy at best, they really did a bad job with this, it gets ruined easy and for a collector, this is a bad thing, i also must warn, amazon shipped it inside an envelope with bubble wrap, not inside a cardboard box and that is a huge , huge letdown. anw, great console, worth the price, just remember that the box is very weak.
customer_reviews.author: rami al ahmad

customer_reviews.title: The best retro arcade of them all, Sega wins mini console war!
customer_reviews.text: The included games are pretty good, the build is solid, the cord length is decent (though i reckmend a pair ofbUSB 2.0 10' extensions). The best part is the system is moddable, you can put any games from n64 down on it, (look for online instructions). The included controllers are needing to be replaced with official sega classic 8 button ones (6 ontop, 2 shoulder). Make sure to get a case thatvis big enough for system and extension cords etc, i regretably bought one that is even snug just with included componenets... picture shouldnshow problem lol.
customer_reviews.author: Hollynator

customer_reviews.title: The best of the mini systems
customer_reviews.text: Sega Genesis Mini might be late to the party, but it really delivers on retro-mini goodness. Sega really put a lot of detail in the mini replication of the console, (the volume slides up and down, the cartridge slot opens, the expansion slot is removable). The software is just as good, game saves and the ability to return to the main menu using the controller. The emulation is nearly perfect. Sega Genesis Mini is a blast.
customer_reviews.author: J. Thoresen

customer_reviews.title: best ever - love it
customer_reviews.text: this may be the best mini system out there. Unlike the previous third party AtGames machines ( I have two of them ) that had extremely poor quality emulation, this is an amazing console which will send you back to the '90s in a wonderful nostalgia trip! this unit an amazing example of how a CLASSIC/MINI console should be made. love it awesome system. Nostalgia overload here I'm. I must buy... in future version I hope to see it get bundled with a 6 button controller's Love it
customer_reviews.author: A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Games very short.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of games for the money, but they are surprisingly short. As a gamer who always played PC games, started building computers in the late 80s, I had never played consoles, so thought I would give it a try. These seem to be ported from the arcades where using quarters quickly was the primary objective. Most of these games last less than a minute, in contrast early computer games like Doom or quake could give up to 10 hours of gameplay. As far as the hardware, it seems to work properly, the controllers seem to work fine also, just wish they had more playable games on the system. Oh well, back to Unreal Tournament!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sega Got It Right In Every Way!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this console. Well worth the 80 bucks for all 42 games. With that being said, the game selection was excellent, clearly between 15-20 top sega games ever made. Also, the fact that sega chose M2 to emulate the the games opposed to previous at-games sega emulation was a downright smart decision. The controllers are practically how I remember them on the original genesis 30 years back in 1989. Overall very pround of Sega.
customer_reviews.author: SCARFACE

customer_reviews.title: nostalgic
customer_reviews.text: Makes me feel like a kid again It was so nice to play these games on a fresh controller . which works wonderful by the way! The three star review is a snob that thinks they’re a professional reviewer they probably weren’t even alive when genesis came out ! lol have a good day !
customer_reviews.author: <^^^Z^^^^Z^^**,,,,,;

customer_reviews.title: Sega did an awesome job!
customer_reviews.text: Sega really went all out to make this the best mini console on the market. The attention to detail and the gameplay are both awesome. This is a must own item.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Boisse

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful piece of nostalgia!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful piece of nostalgia! I’ve also tried Nintendo’s mini NES and mini SNES which are perfect, and this mini Genesis from Sega is right there with the build quality, which is fantastic! It’s impossible that they could include everyone’s favorite games but this mini console includes some great titles. Honestly, it’s worth the price just for Mickey’s Castle of Illusion and Sonic 2 imho. I do wish it contained all of the Street’s of Rage games as well as Sonic the Hedgehog 3 and Sonic and Knuckles.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Huffman

customer_reviews.title: It’s great, so buy it.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re a Sega fan, get this. The lineup of games is great. The console itself is extremely small, as described, so it it very easy to put along with your TV and whatever else you have plugged into it. I would recommend buying the 6 button Retro Bit USB controller for some of the games. I have one for my console, and it works great. My box did come a tad bit damaged, but when I put it on a shelf, it isn’t seen.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Tierce

customer_reviews.title: If you liked the Sega Genesis this is a must have
customer_reviews.text: A great all inclusive mini console. Great game selection, two controllers, power supply, and all cables needed. This plugs in and works right outside of the box. No accessories needed. Great for someone who loved the original. Definitely Giftable.
customer_reviews.author: Notarobot

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the gaming consoles!
customer_reviews.text: Did Amazon Treasure Truck release day and picked it up in the afternoon. So excited! Brings back old memories of when I was a child.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: There are two minis you can find. The Sega Genesis HD mini is the ATGames version, and it's got some great games on it, but the menu system stinks! Then there's the SEGA published one, which runs flawlessly and is a step above the AT Games version. But do yourself a favor and get the both. There's enough variation in the games to warrant doing this. Just ... get both.
customer_reviews.author: J. Giles

customer_reviews.title: Slightly disapointed.
customer_reviews.text: System build quality is great and the controllers feel just like the original ones but I keep getting double presses on the D-pad making it difficult to play platformers on the system. I tried a 6 button Retro Bit controller and it was even worse. I will try buying another controller and hope for the best at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Needs a 6 button controller!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to purchase a 6 button controller if you want to play games like Street Fighter! The console ships with 3 button controllers only. Otherwise, I really like this system. Working great on my HDTV.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent emulator, but limited in scope.
customer_reviews.text: The emulator on this mini beats the one on the Flashback, hands down. No frame skips, no oddities in the music rendering, but that's it. I was hopeful that the cartridge slot wasn't just decoration, but was disappointed. I wanted something that could take my old games and let me play them again with the same abilities as the original Genesis, and while I am confident the emulator on the mini could do it, the hardware let me down. Couple that with the fact that there's only 41 classic games on it, and I had to send it back, disappointed. Ah well, back to the drawing board...
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: My favorite mini console!
customer_reviews.text: M2 did a great job here. The package may not be as complete as I'm used to from M2, but they still put in a valiant effort with a great selection of games. Of course I hacked it as soon as I got to add a couple from my personal collection, but really there isn't much missing here. A fantastic selection of games with controllers that feel very authentic. I'll even overlook some of the sound latency issues because there's so much here.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Starkweather

customer_reviews.title: Missing cable
customer_reviews.text: My Sega Genesis mini was shipped without a USB power cable
customer_reviews.author: Nick Deakins

customer_reviews.title: Sega mini
customer_reviews.text: This is the Sega classic I've been waiting for. It has great titles including even games from konami and capcom I was surprised about. Games like contra and castlevania were great additions to this. Also the Mickey games were a nice surprise. Ignore the crazy gaming nerds saying there's lag or input lag, I never noticed it and If there is it must be minimal because I've played most these games as a kid and plays great. Only thing in was bummed out for was no sonic and knuckles or sonic 3, but somewhat expected it due to music licence issues I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: WILL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mini console
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mini console that I own. The attention to detail on it is nearly perfect. The controllers feal authentic, the game selection is good. Out of the Playstation Classic, the NES Classic, the North American SNES Classic, and the European SNES Mini, all of which I own, the Sega Genesis Mini is the best and highest quality mini replica. The only downside I can think of is that the controllers are the 3-button variant, not the 6-button which would have been better, especially for Street Fighter 2. This product still deserves 5 stars for its amazing quality and detail though. Official 6-button controllers are available to buy from Retro-bit if preferred.
customer_reviews.author: James Gross

customer_reviews.title: My youth is back
customer_reviews.text: I remember playing the Sega Genesis in my early 20's. This brings me back to those days of the great console wars. This has 40 games preinstalled, but if ya look on YouTube you will see how to add a USB stick and add the games you always wanted. With the right software you can play master all the way up to Sega CD. I give this an A for ever thing across the board!!!
customer_reviews.author: The pc builder

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia In A Box
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased the NES Classic and SNES Classic, but was also very excited for this system as the Sega Genesis was a large part of my life back in the day. Overall, it's great. The game selection is nice, minus not having Sonic 3 and Sonic & Knuckles. Comes nicely packaged with two controllers (though not the 6-button pads).
customer_reviews.author: Gaazmon

customer_reviews.title: Best “mini” game console made to date!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST “mini” system made to date. It even beats the NES and SNES in its quality and attention to detail in reproducing the original Genesis. I am extremely impressed with the little machine. Bonus is that now I have great controllers for my PC emulators as well since the controllers are USB and are superb quality!
customer_reviews.author: BadTomatoe

customer_reviews.title: Controller could be better
customer_reviews.text: Emulation is great, console is of nice quality. Dpad on controller is too sensitive in my opinion as it goes all over the place with a small tap.
customer_reviews.author: Peter S

customer_reviews.title: Great retro gaming experience and value for money
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted to enjoy games that I played in my teenage days and it was kind of nostalgic to experience this all over - thanks to this Sega Genesis Mini. Obviously this is no match to today's console in terms of speed and quality of today's games and consoles but nonetheless this gives plentiful of awesome experience and reliving those moments with your kids. Tons of game bundled with the console, works flawlessly and enjoying thoroughly. Great value for your bucks. Taking one star out for Amazon/Seller as product I bought at $56 was reduced to $40 within couple of days and Amazon did not price match.
customer_reviews.author: Avid AMZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the best minis I ever own!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got to say I love nostalgia and M2 did a much better job on Sega Genesis consoles than the crappy ones from ATGames. 42 games....720p HD, 2 wired controllers and a fun interface....makes me feel happy to be a nostalgia and retro gamer. I love this console and you should get it. It's worth the money plus I need to get the 6 button action controller as well!
customer_reviews.author: A. Pellett

customer_reviews.title: More quality and thought put in over the other mini consoles
customer_reviews.text: Sega actually put a lot of thought and quality content in this mini console over the similar consoles from Nintendo and Sony. You can even change the box art to the Japan version by just changing your region language!? The controls on the actual shell move like the original even though they don't actually work but, the details are there even when they didn't have to be. Well done Sega!
customer_reviews.author: Sgt_Retired_Gamer

customer_reviews.title: We already had all these games on a PS3 compilation but it is totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have lived with myself if I hadn't purchased this sega mini to go next to my NES mini, SNES mini and PS1 mini.
customer_reviews.author: NotTheMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great overall, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I would give it 4.5 stars, with a half star deducted for them not including any sports titles even though the Genesis was known as the king console for sports games at the time. Otherwise it has excellent emulation with such little input lag that most gamers will not notice. Although there is slightly noticible sound lag on some of the sound effects on some games.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler J. Davis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite way to play genesis games
customer_reviews.text: Many people will say to build a raspberry pi or similar. I have a zero and a 3b retropi, yet I still prefer this. When paired with a low input latency monitor this is my favorite way to play genesis games. I would get a six button controller with a mode button for easier menu access. If you change your region, you can play alternate region versions of some games, which can have some gameplay differences. I bought two of these just in case one stops working.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: I was a huge fan of sonic. Can’t believe I found the game that looks exactly and sounds exactly like what I remember. Road rash was the same as well. Happy with this purchase. It is small and there isn’t any games to actually put in the console it’s all programmed already.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: trip down memory lane
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself and my 2 young sons so I could share with them some of my favorite games from when I had a Genesis system. the graphics are a little better than I remember and the sound is much cleaner, which I appreciate. We have had lots of fun playing together with this. My oldest son is amazed how much fun these older games can be and how challenging too. Would highly recommend to anyone, gamer or not.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle N.

customer_reviews.title: Neat little device, even used.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of the open box versions from Amazon Warehouse (lacked official box and instruction manual) for about $32 and it works perfectly. And it looks good too. Others have covered what is offered with the console, so I figured I'd just throw in some comments about buying one used from Amazon Warehouse. Especially for those of you who are on the fence about buying it. Buying it used and knocking 8 - 18 dollars off the price makes it an easier decision.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie L.

customer_reviews.title: Fun console, loaded with a good selection
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy this mini console. It is loaded with a good selection of games and seems to be one of the better mini consoles. Definitely worth the money. I would recommend buying cable extenders for the controllers and a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: aftx

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: As good as the Nintendo retro gaming consoles but less than half the price at $60. The save feature is awesome and the controllers are good for the price. Found that the graphics the best on smaller screens with the brightness turned down.
customer_reviews.author: BLC

customer_reviews.title: Wicked throwback gaming and low price
customer_reviews.text: Love this "console". great selection of old school games to boot up form the internal memory. Saves progress too which is excellent. Note - does not seem to work with HDMI 2.0 cables, but the one the comes with it HDMI 1.4 and that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: H B P

customer_reviews.title: Brings back a lot of memories.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice little console and with a very good quality feel for the price. I have zero complaints with the hardware and very few with the software. I remember playing some of these games back in the 1990s and wow this Genesis unit really does them justice. It somehow manages to bring them back to life looking better but not in a way that makes the game look so different that it's not the same.
customer_reviews.author: RobbygTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for our anniversary. He is 36 years old, so he was so happy in receiving this. Very nostalgic for him. I’d give it 1 star for the fact I never see my husband anymore(which could be a 10 for most women with their hubby), a 5 because I know exactly where he is if I can’t find him, a 10 for his happiness, and a 20 for the size. It’s not a big ol’ console; I can tuck it away.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Most well designed retro console
customer_reviews.text: I own the nes and super nes classic versions, and I enjoy playing both, however the genesis mini has some extra features that make it more enjoyable, the controller cables are longer and it allows you to go back to the title select screen without having to hit reset on the console like the nes and super nes classic. You can also gain access to japanese games by switching the language to japanese. The emulation is well done, great little console.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Mini Sega with all the best games... what more to say?
customer_reviews.text: If you love Sega Genesis you'll love this. Has all the best games. Comes with two quality controllers. The interface used for choosing games and saving is well designed and easy to use. I got this for my 5-year-old as his first game system to get him better at using controllers. He has no problem using the controller or menu interface. He only gets frustrated with the unforgiving difficulty of old school games! But he still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sam W.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Magnificent!
customer_reviews.text: It's everything I ever dreamed of for a come back from Sega Genesis to be I absolutely love it and thank you Sega for thinking of your fans. Now let's begin working on the Sega Dreamcast and Sega Saturn.
customer_reviews.author: AXHEJAZ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed eternal champions fan
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so the main reason I bought this was for Eternal Champions. I’m disappointed because the console comes with 2 three button controllers. But the game was designed for the six button controller. In order to switch between punch and kick attacks you have to tap the start button. BUT if you hold the start button, it launches the main menu. Would it really have cost sega that much more to include a 6 button controller?
customer_reviews.author: Jon S

customer_reviews.title: Can you say OLDEN DAYS :)
customer_reviews.text: My husband and i bought this to play together and it brought back so many good memories and we both are enjoying it as we did back then. We have a 12 year old daughter who was like omg what are you and dad playing ! Well we gave her the run down of the good old days..... Thank you all so much for bringing this back for us old folks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Beaman

customer_reviews.title: This thing kicks butt
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the previous Sega flashbacks, the Mini is made by Sega, for Sega, and utilizes the M2 emulator. It stays much truer to the originals, and doesn't jitter like other emulators. Super easy to set up and get playing right out of the box. It's a spot-on small-scale replica of the original Genesis. A bonus - the two supplied controllers are USB and are plug-and-play on Windows PC, so if you have the Genesis classic collection there you can play with an actual Sega controller.
customer_reviews.author: James Hare

customer_reviews.title: It's awesome
customer_reviews.text: If you had a Genesis as a kid or want to introduce your kid to the games you played then get this thing now! The build quality is incredible and the attention to detail is nice too (e.g the top loader actually opens, but it's just for aesthetics). Just know that you should turn your TV to "game mode" to prevent input latency which can make or break your experience. I'm in my 30s now and I love playing this thing since it takes me back to when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: Some person

customer_reviews.title: Good little system for some nostalgia, not everything I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Giving it a pretty good review because it works fantastic, but it definitely leaves a lot to be desired. I was looking for the ability to test old cartridges and didn't realize the slot was made for show. I felt duped! Aside from the lack of ability to play old cartridges you may own, or the lack of ability to add more games to its 40 loaded ones, it's a fantastic build and runs great.
customer_reviews.author: AdamB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game system, tons of memories
customer_reviews.text: I’m in my 30s and remember when I got the original sega at Christmas. Recently my son has become obsessed with sonic thanks to the new movie. So as a surprise I purchased this system so he could play the original sonic games. This is an awesome system and has so many incredible games such as Sonic, Golden Axe, and Comic Zone. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C Rocko III

customer_reviews.title: Great for the retro game fan.
customer_reviews.text: Had a model 2 Genesis when I was little. This brings back lots of great memories. The line up of games is top notch. There are a couple of games I would have love to see for nostalgia reasons, but with all of the licensing complications I really don’t think you could ask for much more than you got here (other than Sonic 3 and Sonic and Knuckles).
customer_reviews.author: Zackery Wavrusa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with this. A couple minor quibbles: the power and HDMI cords are shorter than I’d like. The A/B/C buttons also feel “light.” I don’t know how else to describe it - when you push the buttons it doesn’t have the same firm feeling the controllers of my youth did. But these are minor things - overall this is a solid buy.
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to the SEGA family.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great reproduction of SEGA hardware. Very detailed. The software itself works beautifully and the controllers are spot on. Buying the 6 button controllers is even better but the included ones work for the majority of the games included. The box is also very nicely done. Just like the original packaging although a bit shinier. Everything is packed tightly and I swear that SEGA has been making all of their official products at the same place all these years, because even the brand new plastic has the same smell. Beats out all other retro units, including Nintendo and Sony.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie jurado

customer_reviews.title: Cool Retro Console - Could be better
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good, games are okay with a few exceptions. Could have packed 6 button controller for games that needed it. Overall, a decent little console. Cables are way too short for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: KTS

customer_reviews.title: Brings me back!
customer_reviews.text: Same feel controllers in a tiny system that looks and feels like the originals. Comes complete with “2” of said controllers. 42 games, although I wish there were just a few more. Emulation is almost perfect. Save feature is great. Mostly excellent titles. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Jemtec

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Sega for releasing this,,,so much better then the older ATgames systems.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, Great design and a large catalog of games. As good as the Super NES mini. They even have games that were not released in the USA and if you switch languages it changes to different versions of the game! An example, Dr. Robotnick's Mean Bean Machine is changed to the game Puyo Puyo when you switch the language to Japanese. All the artwork is changed with the game! The Japanese Sonic even has extra layers of scrolling!! Buy this if you love retro games!! This is 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: William Modjeski

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Nintendo consoles
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME mini console that brings me back! Played some of my old favorites like Road Rash, Sonic and Shinobi! Has a total of 42 games included in it. Im sure it will be hackable to include the full Sega library.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Sonic does not work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my nephew (13). He was so excited to play with it. Unfortunately, disappointment set in quickly when he discovered Sonic did not work. The screen sits doing its own thing. There is not a way to actually play the game. The other games are pretty lame. Lesson Learned - It is hard to bond with your nephew over a crap video game system. A total waste of $80.00.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Ford-Pearce

customer_reviews.title: ......Perfect.....IMO
customer_reviews.text: All i can say about this system...... Absolute perfection! I love it! I owned the orginal back in the 90s and the look and feel of the games are as i remember.
customer_reviews.author: KeziaPurrsTop Contributor: Violins

customer_reviews.title: Great for rental property
customer_reviews.text: I had a Playstation at my vacation rental property that was destroyed by renters. Rather than spend money on an expensive replacement, this retro genesis with the built in games works fine. It's mostly kids who use it, and my reviews have indicated that they enjoy it. Great buy for rentals.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Retro Console
customer_reviews.text: By far this is the best retro console of the latest batch of consoles compared to those released from Nintendo and Sony. This puts the earlier sega consoles to shame, I have a @games version and I think it's junk compared to this. If your a Sega fan, it takes me back to when I was a kid.
customer_reviews.author: ATVDUDE

customer_reviews.title: Best mini console yet
customer_reviews.text: Sega put out all the stops with this release. Makes the PS mini look like a tiger handheld release. I find it even better than the NES and SNES outings in that Sega was able to put out original disney titles with full support as well as some great gems. Land Stalker, Street Fighter II Championship Edition and more. These can also be modded if that is your thing, no judgement here.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Moreau

customer_reviews.title: What a blast
customer_reviews.text: We're a low tech family, but wanted to have something to keep the kids busy from time to time and use it as a behavior incentive. All games preloaded and you can go online to get instructions and tips for each game. The kids love it and it buys me better behavior and a little peace.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M

customer_reviews.title: Mini system worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: So this system is awesome!!! I miss my old games so much ,I grew with this system and some of these games I miss so much it's worth the price in gold other then the 6 button controller then that would sweeted the deal.But not deal breaker. But awesome for a throw back and have some fun with you or a few buddy's
customer_reviews.author: Dane Diesner

customer_reviews.title: memories...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second purchase in my urge to recapture the "good ole days" of video gaming. I also wanted to show my kiddo what I had played as a kid. The game selections are good--just wish there was a way to add more. Would LOVE to revisit Nightmare on Elm Street and Splatterhouse.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas S Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Just like the original! Love the attention to detail!
customer_reviews.text: Was just like new! Has all the games ironies with it! Controllers use USB and feel just like the originals that i had growing up! Great assortment of games! My kids love it and i love it too! Sonic I and II! THUNDER FORCE III is a classic i grew up with! Very customizable! I highly recommend for any Sega fan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised; nice crisp image and smooth rendering on my television; controllers feel great; sound is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bronson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Games play well. Great seleclion,. Perfect design. Love that the controllers use USB cable and I can extend it if I want to
customer_reviews.author: K-Real

customer_reviews.title: I've been waiting for this throwback!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Build quality is superb, given it was made by Sega and not a cheap knock-off so I knew it would be. The console is the size of my hand and I can literally fit the whole system in my jacket pocket. Has just about all the games that I played when I was a kid and some that I've never played by wanted to back then. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Brings back many 90's memories
customer_reviews.text: Brings back many 90's memories playing these games. I was surprised how compact this system is compared to the original. Very lightweight and doesn't take up too much space. There are so many games to choose from (Altered beast & Road Rash are my faves). No glitches on any of the games I've played so far. A great purchase overall and something to enjoy for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Novelty Idea
customer_reviews.text: This was an interesting idea for allowing my young kids a gaming option while remembering old games from my own childhood. Always fun with Sonic. Only negative is the graphics being pixelated when you are used to high definition. Good price for some old school gaming.
customer_reviews.author: CWalk

product_meta.title: Sega Genesis Mini - Genesis
product_meta.description:
The iconic SEGA Genesis console that defined a generation of gaming returns in a slick, miniaturized unit. The SEGA Genesis Mini console is loaded with 40 legendary games and is plug and play ready right out of the box! Games will be announced in four waves of 10 games. 

Key Features
- Miniature SEGA Genesis replica
- Includes 40 legendary games
- Plug and play readyBox Contents
- SEGA Genesis Mini Console & 2 wired controllers
- 40 games- Power cable & USB adapter
- HDMI cable 

Currently Announced Games (Wave 1):
- Ecco the Dolphin
- Castlevania: Bloodlines
- Space Harrier 2
- Shining Force
- Dr. Robotnik's Mean Bean Machine
- Toe Jam & Earl
- Comix Zone
- Sonic the Hedgehog
- Altered Beast
- Gunstar Heroes


Wave 2 Titles:
- Earthworm Jim
- Castle of Illusion
- Shinobi III
- Contra: Hard Corps
- Sonic the Hedgehog 2
- World of Illusion
- Thunder Force III
- Super Fantasy Zone
- Streets of Rage 2
- Landstalker 

Wave 3 Titles:
- Beyond Oasis
- Ghouls ‘n Ghosts
- Alex Kidd
- Golden Axe
- Phantasy Star IV
- Street Fighter 2
- Mega Man: The Wily Wars
- Sonic Spinball
- Vectorman
- Wonderboy in Monster World 

Wave 4 Titles
- Virtua Fighter 2
- Alisia Dragoon
- Columns
- Dynamite Headdy
- Strider
- Kid Chameleon
- Light Crusader
- Monster World IV
- Eternal Champions
- Road Rash II


Bonus Games
- Tetris
- Darius
feature_bullets: The iconic SEGA Genesis console that defined a generation of gaming returns in a slick, miniaturized unit.
The SEGA Genesis Mini console is loaded with 42 legendary games and is plug and play ready right out of the box!
Box contents: Sega Genesis Mini console and 2 wired controllers, 40 games + 2 bonus games, power cable and USB adapter, and HDMI cable.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars4,141 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
